stripped_text: As an additional cost to use this hardware, trash 1 installed program. Ignore this cost if an installed program has already been trashed this turn. trash: Install 1 program from your heap, paying 3 credits less.
text: As an additional cost to use this hardware, trash 1 installed program. Ignore this cost if an installed program has already been trashed this turn. [trash]: Install 1 program from your heap, paying 3[credit] less.
title: Simulchip
